author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-Quantum Hi-Tech China Biological's Shares To Halt Trading From April 19 Pending Announcement
text:
(Refiles with correct link)
April 19 (Reuters) - Quantum Hi-tech China Biological Co Ltd :
* SHARES TO HALT TRADING FROM APRIL 19 PENDING ANNOUNCEMENT - SHENZHEN STOCK EXCHANGE Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2qLjhIT Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
